column5: My boss phoned me today, he said, "Is everything okay at the office?"   I said, "Yes, it's all under control. It's been a very busy day, I haven't stopped."   "Can you do me a favor?" he asked.   I said, "Of course, what is it?"   "Speed it up a little, I'm in the foursome behind you."
That joke I can relate to.
Oh...it's a golf joke I get it now I'm not a golfer so it took a while  a matter of fact the only time I ever played golf the only 2 good balls I hit all day was when I stepped on a rake
ha ha. been there done that, but not golfing. fortunately she was a cool boss and it was work related so I was good
Yah Terry.. a golf joke. Not one of your nights in the late 70's !
That was funnier than the joke.
He had to stop to post on OFC while on golf course
